attributes.action: Raise the Palestinian Flag at Walthamstow Town hall
attributes.additional_details: Advocating for our government to raise the Palestinian flag is a heartfelt plea rooted in unity, peace, and justice. It symbolizes our unwavering commitment to global peace and understanding, human rights, inclusivity, and diplomacy, all while conveying our support for a just and peaceful resolution to the conflict.
attributes.background: We urgently appeal for our government to raise the Palestinian flag at our Town Hall, signifying our support for peace and justice, fostering unity and empathy in our town.

rejection.details:
We can’t accept petitions that request action at a local level.
 
In any case, decisions about what flags to fly at town halls are a matter for individual local authorities, not the UK Government or Parliament.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them, by entering your post code here: https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
